name: sockbot
description: A sockpuppet bot to use on http://what.thedailywtf.com.
author: Accalia Elementia <Accalia.de.elementia>

scripts.docs: find . -not \( \( -path ./node_modules -o -path ./test -o -path ./coverage -o -path ./docs -o -path ./bin -o -path ./include -o -path ./lib -o -path ./local \) -prune \) -name \*.js|while read i; do mkdir -p "docs/api/`dirname $i`";jsdoc2md "$i">"docs/api/`basename "$i" .js`.md"; done
